Betrachten Sie bitte die folgende Schleife:


int e = 8;
while (e < 28) {
e = e + 3;
}
System.out.println(e);

Wie oft wird diese Schleife durchlaufen? {1:SHORTANSWER:=7} Welcher Wert wird auf dem Bildschirm ausgegeben? {1:SHORTANSWER:=29}

Betrachten Sie bitte die folgende Schleife:


int b = 6;
while (b < 11) {
b = b + 5;
}
System.out.println(b);

Wie oft wird diese Schleife durchlaufen? {1:SHORTANSWER:=1} Welcher Wert wird auf dem Bildschirm ausgegeben? {1:SHORTANSWER:=11}

Consider a Java program that stores information about conferences. You have a variable conferences of type List. Each object of type Conference has a method getParticipants() that returns the participants of the conference as an integer. Complete the following code that adds up the participants of all conferences:

int total = 0;
for({1:SHORTANSWER:=Conference} element : {1:SHORTANSWER:=conferences})) {
total += {1:SHORTANSWER:=element.getParticipants();}
}
System.out.println("Total: " + total);

Consider a Java program that stores information about books. You have a variable books of type List. Each object of type Book has a method getPages() that returns the pages of the book as an integer. Complete the following code that adds up the pages of all books:

int total = 0;
for({1:SHORTANSWER:=Book} element : {1:SHORTANSWER:=books})) {
total += {1:SHORTANSWER:=element.getPages();}
}
System.out.println("Total: " + total);

Consider a Java program that stores information about clubs. You have a variable clubs of type List. Each object of type Club has a method getMembers() that returns the members of the club as an integer. Complete the following code that adds up the members of all clubs:

int total = 0;
for({1:SHORTANSWER:=Club} element : {1:SHORTANSWER:=clubs})) {
total += {1:SHORTANSWER:=element.getMembers();}
}
System.out.println("Total: " + total);
